title: Download the latest AMECO database
text: CONSTRUCTION - come back later… R package downloading latest data European Commission’s AMECO macro-economic database. https://economy-finance.ec.europa.eu/economic-research--databases/economic-databases/ameco-database_en

title: Download the latest AMECO database
text: can install development version ecmacro GitHub :

title: Download the latest AMECO database
code: library(ecmacro)  # Download the data AMECO <- get_ecmacro()  # Search by CODE (1) ZUTN <- find_series(AMECO, "zutn", field = 1)   # Extract and plot a series IRL_ZUTN <- get_series(AMECO, "IRL.1.0.0.0.ZUTN")
